overview: ‘It’s springtime’, a little bird stealing the filaments of my window screen reminded me this morning.  ‘The sun in shining, the sky is blue, the trees are blossoming pink flowers and there is a wide world to be explored…what are you doing indoors?’  This 2002 video by artist Pipilotti Rist seems to be proposing a similar criticism in her reframing of concepts of time, season and the human lifespan.
title: Lullaby
